name: h3
description: The 2025 Demarini Zen Drop 10 USA Baseball Bat is engineered for both contact and power hitters, offering a perfect balance in swing feel. With its USA Baseball Certification, this bat features a two-piece composite design and a 2 5/8 inch barrel diameter, ensuring optimal performance on the field. The Dark Matter Composite technology provides a gradual taper barrel, enhancing the sweet spot for higher performance, while the Anomaly Connection boosts energy transfer and bat speed, ensuring comfort with every swing. The bat's Anomaly End Cap reduces swing weight for improved control, and the fortified metal compound knob enhances durability and leverage, making it a top choice for players seeking precision and power. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included.
